original_text: Moreover, he built cities in the hill country of Judah, and forts and towers on the wooded hills.
korean_text: 유다 산중에 성읍들을 건축하며 수풀 가운데에 견고한 진영들과 망대를 건축하고

sentences.original_text: he built cities in the hill country of Judah,
and forts and towers on the wooded hills.
sentences.korean_translation: 삼림이 우거진 언덕에는 요새와 망대를 건축했다.
